title: 08/05/21 DPS Hour 3 Charlie Steiner
itunes:title: 08/05/21 DPS Hour 3 Charlie Steiner
description:
Dodgers radio broadcaster Charlie Steiner joins The Dan Patrick Show to explain why history won't look fondly upon the Houston Astros, and gives all the details on the atmosphere at Dodger Stadium in the two game series against the Astros.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
